description: Decimal expansion of the constant Product_{i=1..inf} ((1-3/(2*(i+1)))^(1/2^i).
references: D.-Z. Du and F. K. Hwang, Combinatorial Group Testing and Its Applications, World Scientific, 2nd ed., 2000; p. 37.
mathematica: Exp[2*Derivative[1, 0][PolyLog][0, 1/2] - Derivative[0, 1, 0][LerchPhi][1/2, 0, 1/2]/2] // RealDigits[#, 10, 105]& // First (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 19 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 22 2000
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 28 2001
